description.english: Store or dispose of sharp objects/medications; use lockboxes and safety caps; ask a trusted person to hold items temporarily. How it works: Reduces access during crisis peaks. Example: Friend keeps razors and extra meds for two weeks.""
description.hindi: Store or dispose of sharp objects/medications; use lockboxes and safety caps; ask a trusted person to hold items temporarily. How it works: Reduces access during crisis peaks. Example: Friend keeps razors and extra meds for two weeks.""
description.marathi: Store or dispose of sharp objects/medications; use lockboxes and safety caps; ask a trusted person to hold items temporarily. How it works: Reduces access during crisis peaks. Example: Friend keeps razors and extra meds for two weeks.""

description.english: List warning signs; coping steps; safe places; contacts; and emergency numbers; keep it visible. How it works: Provides a script under stress. Example: Phone note with 3 grounding steps + therapist and crisis numbers.""
description.hindi: List warning signs; coping steps; safe places; contacts; and emergency numbers; keep it visible. How it works: Provides a script under stress. Example: Phone note with 3 grounding steps + therapist and crisis numbers.""
description.marathi: List warning signs; coping steps; safe places; contacts; and emergency numbers; keep it visible. How it works: Provides a script under stress. Example: Phone note with 3 grounding steps + therapist and crisis numbers.""

description.english: Use a 10–20 minute timer and do a neutral task (shower; tea; walk). How it works: Urges often crest and fall. Example: Wash dishes while listening to a calming playlist.""
description.hindi: Use a 10–20 minute timer and do a neutral task (shower; tea; walk). How it works: Urges often crest and fall. Example: Wash dishes while listening to a calming playlist.""
description.marathi: Use a 10–20 minute timer and do a neutral task (shower; tea; walk). How it works: Urges often crest and fall. Example: Wash dishes while listening to a calming playlist.""

description.english: Do 5-4-3-2-1 senses while breathing out slowly for 6 counts. How it works: Shifts focus to the present and calms the nervous system. Example: Name 5 things you see in the room while exhaling slowly.""
description.hindi: Do 5-4-3-2-1 senses while breathing out slowly for 6 counts. How it works: Shifts focus to the present and calms the nervous system. Example: Name 5 things you see in the room while exhaling slowly.""
description.marathi: Do 5-4-3-2-1 senses while breathing out slowly for 6 counts. How it works: Shifts focus to the present and calms the nervous system. Example: Name 5 things you see in the room while exhaling slowly.""

description.english: Name emotion + intensity and one need (e.g.; """"despair 8/10—need support""""). How it works: Lowers reactivity and clarifies next steps. Example: Write feelings on a sticky note and choose one helpful action.""
description.hindi: Name emotion + intensity and one need (e.g.; """"despair 8/10—need support""""). How it works: Lowers reactivity and clarifies next steps. Example: Write feelings on a sticky note and choose one helpful action.""
description.marathi: Name emotion + intensity and one need (e.g.; """"despair 8/10—need support""""). How it works: Lowers reactivity and clarifies next steps. Example: Write feelings on a sticky note and choose one helpful action.""

description.english: Text/call a trusted person before the urge peaks; use a short script. How it works: Connection disrupts isolation. Example: """"Having a tough moment—can you stay on the line 5 minutes?""""""
description.hindi: Text/call a trusted person before the urge peaks; use a short script. How it works: Connection disrupts isolation. Example: """"Having a tough moment—can you stay on the line 5 minutes?""""""
description.marathi: Text/call a trusted person before the urge peaks; use a short script. How it works: Connection disrupts isolation. Example: """"Having a tough moment—can you stay on the line 5 minutes?""""""

description.english: Schedule regular therapy; save crisis contacts; know nearest ER/helpline. How it works: Ensures rapid access to professional help. Example: Weekly CBT/DBT session + crisis line on speed dial.""
description.hindi: Schedule regular therapy; save crisis contacts; know nearest ER/helpline. How it works: Ensures rapid access to professional help. Example: Weekly CBT/DBT session + crisis line on speed dial.""
description.marathi: Schedule regular therapy; save crisis contacts; know nearest ER/helpline. How it works: Ensures rapid access to professional help. Example: Weekly CBT/DBT session + crisis line on speed dial.""

description.english: Sleep; and Nutrition;""Keep consistent sleep/wake; simple meals; light movement. How it works: Stabilizes mood and energy. Example: 11 pm lights out; 7 am wake; 20-minute walk after lunch.""
description.hindi: Sleep; and Nutrition;""Keep consistent sleep/wake; simple meals; light movement. How it works: Stabilizes mood and energy. Example: 11 pm lights out; 7 am wake; 20-minute walk after lunch.""
description.marathi: Sleep; and Nutrition;""Keep consistent sleep/wake; simple meals; light movement. How it works: Stabilizes mood and energy. Example: 11 pm lights out; 7 am wake; 20-minute walk after lunch.""

description.english: Reduce or avoid use; especially during vulnerable times. How it works: Prevents impulse escalation. Example: No alcohol at home; choose a sparkling water routine.""
description.hindi: Reduce or avoid use; especially during vulnerable times. How it works: Prevents impulse escalation. Example: No alcohol at home; choose a sparkling water routine.""
description.marathi: Reduce or avoid use; especially during vulnerable times. How it works: Prevents impulse escalation. Example: No alcohol at home; choose a sparkling water routine.""

description.english: Why it helps: Quickly reduces physiological arousal during crisis. What to do: Inhale 4s; hold 4s; exhale 4s; hold 4s for 3–5 minutes. Example: Use when urge ≥7/10 to bring it down before taking next step.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Quickly reduces physiological arousal during crisis. What to do: Inhale 4s; hold 4s; exhale 4s; hold 4s for 3–5 minutes. Example: Use when urge ≥7/10 to bring it down before taking next step.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Quickly reduces physiological arousal during crisis. What to do: Inhale 4s; hold 4s; exhale 4s; hold 4s for 3–5 minutes. Example: Use when urge ≥7/10 to bring it down before taking next step.""

description.english: Why it helps: Anchors attention in the present to interrupt spirals. What to do: Name 5 see; 4 feel; 3 hear; 2 smell; 1 taste. Example: After a triggering message; complete the sequence before any action.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Anchors attention in the present to interrupt spirals. What to do: Name 5 see; 4 feel; 3 hear; 2 smell; 1 taste. Example: After a triggering message; complete the sequence before any action.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Anchors attention in the present to interrupt spirals. What to do: Name 5 see; 4 feel; 3 hear; 2 smell; 1 taste. Example: After a triggering message; complete the sequence before any action.""

description.english: Why it helps: Releases body tension that amplifies distress. What to do: Tense 5s/release 10s from feet to face for 8–10 minutes. Example: Do before bed when rumination spikes.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Releases body tension that amplifies distress. What to do: Tense 5s/release 10s from feet to face for 8–10 minutes. Example: Do before bed when rumination spikes.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Releases body tension that amplifies distress. What to do: Tense 5s/release 10s from feet to face for 8–10 minutes. Example: Do before bed when rumination spikes.""

description.english: Why it helps: Activates diving reflex to calm the nervous system. What to do: Splash cold water on face or hold ice 30–60s while slow breathing. Example: During peak urge; pair with a 10‑minute delay.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Activates diving reflex to calm the nervous system. What to do: Splash cold water on face or hold ice 30–60s while slow breathing. Example: During peak urge; pair with a 10‑minute delay.""

description.english: Why it helps: Lengthened exhale engages parasympathetic tone. What to do: Inhale 4s; exhale 6s for 5 minutes; shoulders relaxed. Example: After conflict; sit and breathe before making decisions.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Lengthened exhale engages parasympathetic tone. What to do: Inhale 4s; exhale 6s for 5 minutes; shoulders relaxed. Example: After conflict; sit and breathe before making decisions.""

description.english: Why it helps: Creates mental distance from triggering thoughts. What to do: Close eyes and visualize a calming scene with rich sensory detail for 5 minutes. Example: Imagine a quiet lakeside at sunset.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Creates mental distance from triggering thoughts. What to do: Close eyes and visualize a calming scene with rich sensory detail for 5 minutes. Example: Imagine a quiet lakeside at sunset.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Creates mental distance from triggering thoughts. What to do: Close eyes and visualize a calming scene with rich sensory detail for 5 minutes. Example: Imagine a quiet lakeside at sunset.""

description.english: Why it helps: Counters harsh self-talk fueling urges. What to do: Read a prewritten script aloud slowly. Example: “This pain will pass. I choose safety and support. I deserve care.”""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Counters harsh self-talk fueling urges. What to do: Read a prewritten script aloud slowly. Example: “This pain will pass. I choose safety and support. I deserve care.”""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Counters harsh self-talk fueling urges. What to do: Read a prewritten script aloud slowly. Example: “This pain will pass. I choose safety and support. I deserve care.”""

description.english: Why it helps: Gentle movement reduces stress hormones and rumination. What to do: Walk; match steps to breath; notice 3 new details each minute. Example: Hallway or balcony walk during late-night spikes.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Gentle movement reduces stress hormones and rumination. What to do: Walk; match steps to breath; notice 3 new details each minute. Example: Hallway or balcony walk during late-night spikes.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Gentle movement reduces stress hormones and rumination. What to do: Walk; match steps to breath; notice 3 new details each minute. Example: Hallway or balcony walk during late-night spikes.""

description.english: Why it helps: Builds interoceptive awareness to catch escalation early. What to do: Scan crown to toes; label sensations nonjudgmentally for 8–10 minutes. Example: Notice jaw/shoulder tension and release it.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Builds interoceptive awareness to catch escalation early. What to do: Scan crown to toes; label sensations nonjudgmentally for 8–10 minutes. Example: Notice jaw/shoulder tension and release it.""

description.english: Why it helps: Identifies high-risk contexts so you can intervene early. What to do: Track time; place; mood (0–10); urge (0–10); preceding event. Example: 11 pm; alone after argument; sadness 8/10; urge 7/10.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Identifies high-risk contexts so you can intervene early. What to do: Track time; place; mood (0–10); urge (0–10); preceding event. Example: 11 pm; alone after argument; sadness 8/10; urge 7/10.""

description.hindi: Why it helps: Surfaces thoughts that intensify despair. What to do: Write situation; automatic thought; emotion; behavior urge. Example: """"Failed the test"""" → """"I’m hopeless"""" → despair 9/10; urge 7/10.""

description.hindi: Why it helps: Replaces distortions with balanced; helpful thoughts. What to do: Evidence for/against; alternative view; realistic outcome. Example: """"No one cares"""" → List recent check-ins; balanced: """"Some people do care.""""""

description.english: Why it helps: Lifts mood by increasing mastery/pleasure. What to do: Schedule 3 daily actions: one pleasure; one mastery; one connection. Example: Walk 15 min; submit one email; call a friend.""

description.english: Why it helps: Provides safe; rapid strategies during peaks. What to do: Prepare ice; sour candy; grounding card; music; crisis numbers. Example: Hold ice 60s + 5-4-3-2-1 until urge <4/10.""

description.english: Why it helps: Reduces immediate risk and guides action. What to do: List warning signs; coping steps; contacts; lock away/handoff sharps/meds. Example: Friend holds razors; crisis line on speed dial.""

description.english: Why it helps: Shifts from rumination to concrete steps. What to do: Define problem; brainstorm options; choose one; plan next action. Example: Debt stress → call helpline; set payment plan.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Shifts from rumination to concrete steps. What to do: Define problem; brainstorm options; choose one; plan next action. Example: Debt stress → call helpline; set payment plan.""

description.english: Why it helps: Teaches urges rise and fall without acting. What to do: 10–20 minute timer; breathe 4-in/6-out; rate urge each minute. Example: 8→6→4 by minute 12.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Teaches urges rise and fall without acting. What to do: 10–20 minute timer; breathe 4-in/6-out; rate urge each minute. Example: 8→6→4 by minute 12.""

description.english: Why it helps: Reveals patterns that precede intense urges so intervention can start earlier. What to do: Log situations; thoughts; body cues; and times before spikes. Example: After conflict + 2 hours of rumination → urge rose to 7/10.""

description.english: Why it helps: Counters tunnel vision for short-term relief. What to do: Two columns: immediate effects vs long-term costs/alternatives. Example: Relief 5 minutes vs medical risk; secrecy; alternative: call helpline + cold water splash.""

description.english: Why it helps: Repetition speeds recognition and disputing in real time. What to do: Record A (event); B (belief); C (feeling/urge 0–10); D (dispute); E (new effect). Example: A: loneliness; B: """"I’ll always be alone""""; C: 8→ after D: 5.""
